column5: it will be up to him if he wants to post pics etc.. old ironmaker i offered it to someone young becuase i thought it might make a great memory for them and they likely dont have the same opportunities as older guys, i wanted someone who truely would be pumped to go.For what its worth one of his parents are going with him.
Like I said I don't want to ruffle any feathers. I'm glad a parent is going along.
How'd you guys make out?  S
Sorry, I'll try to post something tonight, there weren't a tonne of quality fish, but still a lot of fun

I have a seat in the boat for Saturday and would like to offer it too a young guy that doesnt get to fish in a boat often. Leaving from Oshawa and can meet anywhere in between.Some gas money would be much appreciated. planning on leaving at 6am and fishing until 6pm.
That's a great opportunity. Hirk (my phoned wanted to spell hurl) might even know a thing or two about fishing.
very nice of you hirk !!
Very kind offer you got going on - hope you find someone super enthusiastic to go!
someone should jump on this real quick i know dave well,and have fished with him !!!  you will be on fish thats for sure !!! cheers dave !!!
Ya, too bad I'm not that young anymore and now have a boat again.
Ya know, if you still had the Allison...I don't fit the criteria, but you are welcome to join me in my neck of the woods anytime.
Where is Seymour?? I live in Whitby and am boatless... I refer to myself as being young.

Thx guys, ya im hoping to make a young guys day by giving him a chance to put a few in the boat.locnar it is east of rice lake, its part of the trent system, would you have a ride to meet me? i have rods and tackle for any guys interested in going if you dont have your own.By younger i mean 20ish +- a few
What a great opportunity!  Good on you for offering this up.  If it was 1989 I'd take you up on your offer. Lol
When yer offering one for the older fellas,Im in.  Nice offering Hirk.   LMAO CLIFF.
I'm in, have to ask parents first. Send me a pm?
BTW I'm 15
And he,s a good kid ^^^^^^^^^^   WHAT TOOK YOU SO LONG CHRISTOPHER? LOL
The seats all yours Chris.
O. what an awesome offer. Hope you guys enjoy the trip! If it's still available or if it doesn't work out I can fill in I'm 24 and boatless

Chris k this is a great opportunity to go out and learn learn learn !!! And Dave will show you how to rig up and all the finnese details you will need and you will be on some fish that's for sure !!!!  I'm sure you will enjoy and take some pics and most of all have fun !!!!!! Cheers & tight-lines.     Shawn
Good on you for the offer, hope it all works out.. Maureen
I too was shocked it took Chris so long to reply to Dave!!!  Dave, he's a good kid.  Chris is too...
Yes and I doubt Chris is ever been in an Allison bass boat that does 80mph !!!!!! Hahaha ..... It's a very nice fast bass boat !!!!!! Awesome
Wow. I'm almost too old to fit the criteria! Lol

looks like Chris is going, bobodo i will keep you in mind if another opportunity comes up. shawn i was still learning to drive when we fished, i ended up sqeezing 92mph out of it but I sold it and have a gambler now, I miss it
Thanks again, hope you guys have a good opener!
I'm looking forward to the report!!  VERY nice gesture Dave!    Have a fantastic day!
Why offer this opportunity to a young person only? I don't want to ruffle any feathers here but it would be a cold day in hell before I let my 15 year old go off with someone I don't know from Adam.
